title: Strengthening Statistical Sampling and Evidence-Based Reasoning Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Statistical Concepts Comprehension and Job-Related Data Analysis Experience
context.additional_context: A collaborative learning environment focused on building persuasive arguments using statistical evidence in real-world work contexts by current practitioners.

learning_goals: Based on real-world job cases, learners can construct data-driven arguments by applying sampling methods.
Through collaborative learning with peers, learners improve their ability to evaluate the validity of evidence-based arguments from multiple perspectives.
Periodically assess and improve the ability to structure arguments using statistical concepts through formative assessments
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
